Utilities¶

oodtk.utils¶

oodtk.utils.calc_openness(n_train, n_test, n_target)¶

In Toward open set recognition from Scheirer, Jain, Boult et al, the Openness was defined.

\[\mathcal{O} = 1 - \sqrt{ \frac{2 \times n_{train}}{n_{test} \times n_{target}} }\]
Returns

Openness of the problem

Paper

https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/6365193

oodtk.utils.contains_known(labels) → bool¶
Returns

true if the labels contains any known labels

oodtk.utils.contains_known_and_unknown(labels) → bool¶
Returns

true if the labels contain known and unknown classes

oodtk.utils.contains_unknown(labels) → bool¶
Returns

true if the labels contains any unknown labels

oodtk.utils.is_known(labels)¶
Returns

True, if label >= 0

oodtk.utils.is_unknown(labels)¶
Returns

True, if label < 0
